item.title: Troll program
item.dc:creator: @Wyrmcabbage Wyrmcabbage
item.description:
@Wyrmcabbage wrote:

I favor some operating systems.
Prepare for some messy code.

[code=java5]package Random;
/*

  • @author YourFace
    */

/*

  • UNINDENTED CODE IS UNINDENTED
  • UNINDENTED CODE IS UNINDENTED
  • UNINDENTED CODE IS UNINDENTED
  • UNINDENTED CODE IS UNINDENTED
  • UNINDENTED CODE IS UNINDENTED
  • UNINDENTED CODE IS UNINDENTED
  • UNINDENTED CODE IS UNINDENTED
  • UNINDENTED CODE IS UNINDENTED
  • UNINDENTED CODE IS UNINDENTED
  • UNINDENTED CODE IS UNINDENTED
  • UNINDENTED CODE IS UNINDENTED
  • UNINDENTED CODE IS UNINDENTED
    */

import javax.swing.*;

public class Objects {
public static void main(String[] args) {
try {
UIManager.setLookAndFeel(“com.sun.java.swing.plaf.windows.WindowsLookAndFeel”);
} catch(Exception e) {JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(null, "You must " +
“not be runnning windows, so unless you’re running UNIX/Ubuntu,” +
“You really suck”);}
try { //Unnecessary try clause lol//
String os = input(“What operating system do you like?”);

	if (os.equalsIgnoreCase("windows")) {
		message("You're pretty dang awesome");
	} else if (os.equalsIgnoreCase("Mac") || os.equalsIgnoreCase("Apple")) {
		message("You and your pretty boy crap computer are both a disgrace to humanity" +
				" and computer-kind alike");
	} else if (os.equalsIgnoreCase("Linux") || os.equalsIgnoreCase("Unix")){
		message("You're really awesome");
	} else if (os.equalsIgnoreCase("Solaris") || os.equalsIgnoreCase("CentOS")) {
		message("50-50 on that one.");
	} else {
		message("Unkown operating system?");
	}
	} catch (Exception e) {/*I like throwing exceptions*/}
	}

private static String input(String string) {
	return JOptionPane.showInputDialog(string);
	
}

private static void message(String string) {
	JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(null, string);
	
}
}

[/code]

Read full topic
